ygData.subject: RE: How Lullaby used to be.
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s a screenshot of a Gnoll chorus line that I took in Blackburrow on the main bridge.  At the time I was fairly high level, say mid 30s.  I held a train of
ygData.messageBody:
Here's a screenshot of a Gnoll chorus line that I took in Blackburrow on the
main bridge. At the time I was fairly high level, say mid 30s. I held a
train of about 30 Gnolls dead in its tracks while folks 8 - 15 took them
down. A few of them that weren't engaged did attack, but it was infrequent.
This was after we all felt like the song had been nerfed.

http://www.magnecom.com/lullagnoll.jpg

[45 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> I was roaming around the net and I found these old pictures Sylly
> took. I have some of my own, but these show the outside perspective.
